But then, Miss Elaina gets carried away and forgets to pass to Daniel. Daniel wonders if Miss Elaina doesn't wants to be his friend anymore. Lady Elaine reminds Daniel that even when friends play with someone new, they will still be friends with you.
content.short_description: Daniel feels left out when Miss Elaina throws the ball to Jodi instead of him.
content.title: Daniel Plays with Jodi and Miss Elaina

content.description: Daniel imagines that he's playing splatball on a big court. Tigey, a  teddy bear and a stuffed rabbit play with him as a giant crowd watches. They run up and down the court, making the balls go "splat"!
content.short_description: Daniel imagines that he's playing professional spaltball!
content.title: Splatball!

content.description: Jodi and Daniel are playing polar bears, and Miss Elaina is playing explorers! Daniel decides that being an explorer sounds Tigertastic - he wants to play explorers instead. Jodi feels sad that he doesn't want to play her game. She doesn't think that Daniel wants to be her friend anymore. Daniel reminds her that even when friends play with someone new, they will still be friends with you.
content.short_description: Jodi wants to play polar bears, but Daniel wants to play explorers with Miss Elaina.
content.title: The Polar Bear Explorers

content.description: Baker Aker loves to bake, but he also loves to dance! He invites us inside the bakery to show off his Folklorico dance. He points his toes, snaps, and claps. Anyone can dance - if you can't dance with your feet, you can dance with your hands, or even your eyebrows!
content.short_description: Baker Aker shows off a style of dance called Folklorico.
content.title: Baker Aker's Dance

content.description: It's Jodi's first day at school! This new school doesn't look like her old one. Teacher Harriet tells Jodi that a new school might look different and feel a little strange, but she can look around to find something or someone familiar to help her feel better. Jodi sees...Daniel!
content.short_description: Jodi's new school doesn't look like her old school.
content.title: Welcome to School, Jodi!

content.description: Daniel walks with Jodi as they look for something Jodi knows to help her feel better in this new place.
content.short_description: Daniel helps to welcome Jodi to her new school.
content.title: Daniel is a First Day Friend

content.description: Jodi tries to order pan-pans from Katerina's orange restaurant, but pan-pans aren't orange. Jodi is sad that she doesn't know the rules of this game. She wanders to the book corner instead, and when she looks around for something she knows, she finds a Tigey the Adventure Tiger book!
content.short_description: Jodi doesn't know how to play a game. She finds a book she knows instead!
content.title: Jodi Finds Something She Knows

content.description: It's Carolyn's first day at a new school. Her mom reminds her that she can find something she knows in her classroom to help her feel better. Carolyn plays blocks with a boy named Daniel, and reads some books that look like the ones she has at home.
content.short_description: A real-life girl named Carolyn finds something she knows on her first day at school.
content.title: No Matter Where You Go

content.description: Daniel goes to Jodi's house after school to play! When he gets there, Jodi tells him that at their house, they wear slippers inside instead of shoes. Daniel is unsure about taking off his shoes, but Dr. Plat reminds him that he can find something he knows in this new place.
content.short_description: Daniel goes to Jodi's house after school.
content.title: Daniel's Slippers

content.description: Daniel imagines that he's wearing all kinds of different shoes! He clacks in cowboy boots, dances in ballet slippers, skates in ice skates, taps in tap shoes, and splashes in rainboots!
content.short_description: Daniel imagines he's trying on all kinds of shoes!
content.title: Daniel Tries on Shoes

content.description: While Daniel is looking at different items under the magnifier at school, he accidentally knocks a basket of objects off the table, sending things tumbling all over the floor. Whoops! / Daniel and Prince Wednesday are at the bakery helping Baker Aker make cookies for the Neighborhood. But Prince Wednesday accidentally spills the milk! No crying, though, because mistakes can happen.
content.short_description: Daniel and his friends learn that it's okay to make mistakes.
content.title: Daniel Makes a Mistake/Baking Mistakes

content.description: Danielâ€™s neighbor Jodi is sad when her mama leaves for a work trip until Daniel helps Jodi feel better by reminding her that grown-ups come back. / Teddy and Leo Platypus get upset when their Nana leaves for the market. Daniel and Mom Tiger help them feel better by playing with them and reminding them that their Nana will come back. And after three days away, Dr. Plat returns too!
content.short_description: Jodi is sad when her mama leaves for work. / The twins are sad when Nana leaves.
content.title: Jodi's Mama Travels for Work/The Tiger Family Babysit

content.description: When Daniel goes to gymnastics for the first time, he feels a little nervous to join in with his friends. Dad Tiger helps Daniel feel brave by doing the gymnastics movements together and showing him that he can do it all on his own. / Daniel and O the Owl are excited to ride the dinosaur slide at the playground, but when O sees how tall it is, he gets a little scared.
content.short_description: Daniel goes to gymnastics for the first time. / O is scared of the dinosaur slide.
content.title: Daniel Does Gymnastics/The Big Slide

content.description: At the Neighborhood Carnival, Miss Elaina shows off her cartwheel trick, but when Daniel tries, he canâ€™t do a cartwheel like the one Miss Elaina did. Dad Tiger teaches Daniel that he can do a trick his own way! / Daniel is playing school with Miss Elaina and Jodi, but Miss Elaina gets upset when Jodi keeps copying her. The friends help Jodi realize that she has great ideas of her own.
content.short_description: You can play in your own special way!
content.title: Daniel's Tiger Twirl/You Can Play Your Own Way

content.description: King Friday announces that the kids can choose one new piece of playground equipment by voting for their favorite! / Daniel and his friends get to choose a new class pet! Teacher Harriet explains the choices, and they can vote for their favorite.
content.short_description: The kids choose new playground equipment./Daniel and his friends vote for a class pet!
content.title: The Neighborhood Votes/The Class Votes

content.description: Daniel is sad that Grandpere Tiger is leaving soon, but he learns to be thankful for the time they do have together! / When a gust of wind blows the thank you notes off the Neighborhood Thank You Tree, Mr. McFeely saves the day!
content.short_description: Daniel is sad that Grandpere Tiger is leaving soon. / Mr. McFeely saves the day!
content.title: Thank You, Grandpere Tiger!/Neighborhood Thank You Day

content.description: Itâ€™s Daniels turn to take care of Snowball, the class pet, at home today. When Prince Wednesday invites Daniel to play, he has to decide the best thing to do: take care of Snowball or go and have fun with his friend. / Daniel is at home playing with his toy horse when Mom asks him to help her give Margaret a bath. Daniel realizes how good it makes him feel to take care of his sister.
content.short_description: It's Daniels turn to care for Snowball. / Daniel helps give Margaret a bath.
content.title: Daniel Takes Care of Snowball/Margaret's Bathtime

content.description: Daniel canâ€™t wait to show Margaret all of the things they can do to celebrate Thank You Day at the Enchanted Garden! However, when Margaret gets sick and has to leave early, Daniel decides to bring Thank You Day back to Margaret instead.
content.short_description: Daniel canâ€™t wait to show Margaret the things they can do to celebrate Thank You Day!
content.title: Margaretâ€™s First Thank You Day

content.description: When Daniel learns he canâ€™t gather with all of his neighbors at the Neighborhood Carnival this year, it leads to lots of big feelings and questions, including what to do when he misses people he loves, how to keep himself and others healthy, and how to find ways to enjoy the extra time at home with his family.
content.short_description: Daniel has lots of feelings when he canâ€™t go to the Neighborhood Carnival this year.
content.title: Wonâ€™t You Sing Along With Me?

curated_collections.title: It's A Beautiful Day in My Neighborhood

content.description: Mr. McFeely shares how he sorts the mail at the post office.
content.short_description: Mr. McFeely shares how he sorts the mail at the post office.
content.title: Mr. McFeely's Surprise Delivery

content.description: Miss Elaina shows how she plays a backwards game on Backwards Day.
content.short_description: Miss Elaina shows how she plays a backwards game on Backwards Day.
content.title: Miss Elaina's Backwards Game

content.description: Daniel sings a special birthday song to Tigey (and you!)
content.short_description: Daniel sings a special birthday song to Tigey (and you!)
content.title: Happy Birthday from Daniel Tiger!

content.description: Jodi sings a song with her Mama sings so she knows how long to brush her teeth!
content.short_description: Jodi sings a song with her Mama sings so she knows how long to brush her teeth!
content.title: Jodi's Tooth-Brushing Song

content.description: Chrissie takes us on a special rock treasure hunt that she set up for Prince Wednesday.
content.short_description: Chrissie takes us on a special rock treasure hunt that she set up for Prince Wednesday.
content.title: Chrissie's Rock Hunt

content.description: Henrietta and Katerina play a flashlight memory game while camping.
content.short_description: Henrietta and Katerina play a flashlight memory game while camping.
content.title: Henrietta's Camping Game

content.description: tbh
content.short_description: tbh
content.title: Teacher Harriet's Puzzle

content.description: Dr. Plat makes colorful play clay with Teddy and Leo.
content.short_description: Dr. Plat makes colorful play clay with Teddy and Leo.
content.title: Dr. Plat's Play Clay

content.description: Amira visits the beach and collects seashells to make a bracelet.
content.short_description: Amira visits the beach and collects seashells to make a bracelet.
content.title: Amira's Seashells

content.description: Mom Tiger makes Daniel and Margaret a strawberry-banana ice treat on a hot day.
content.short_description: Mom Tiger makes Daniel and Margaret a strawberry-banana ice treat on a hot day.
content.title: Mom Tiger's Ice Treats

content.description: Lady Elaine is persistant when learning how to make her yo-yo go "around the world".
content.short_description: Lady Elaine is persistant when learning how to make her yo-yo go "around the world".
content.title: Lady Elaine's Yo-Yo Trick

content.description: Join Jodi's Nana as she shows how she sews a quilt out of her grandkids' old t-shirts.
content.short_description: Join Jodi's Nana as she shows how she sews a quilt out of her grandkids' old t-shirts.
content.title: Nana's Quilt

content.description: Max and Amira play bus station together.
content.short_description: Max and Amira play bus station together.
content.title: Max and Amira's Bus Station

content.description: King Friday makes a wind chime out of recycled materials.
content.short_description: King Friday makes a wind chime out of recycled materials.
content.title: King Friday's Recycled Wind Chime

content.description: Music Man Stan makes a superhero costume for Miss Elaina.
content.short_description: Music Man Stan makes a superhero costume for Miss Elaina.
content.title: Music Man Stan's Costumes

content.description: Grandpere takes us to his cucumber garden and shows how he makes pickles.
content.short_description: Grandpere takes us to his cucumber garden and shows how he makes pickles.
content.title: Grandpere's Garden

content.description: Queen Sara gives a special look into her morning routine: a song and dance to help Prince Wednesday wake up!
content.short_description: Queen Sara shares her morning routine: a song and dance to help Prince Wednesday wake up!
content.title: Queen Sara's Wake-Up Song

content.description: Katerina shows us a ladybug lunch treat she makes with her Mom.
content.short_description: Katerina shows us a ladybug lunch treat she makes with her Mom.
content.title: Katerinaâ€™s Ladybug Lunch

content.description: X and O share a craft they made to reflect on all of the things they're thankful for.
content.short_description: X and O share a craft they made to reflect on all of the things they're thankful for.
content.title: X and O's Thank You Jar

content.description: Music Man Stan makes bowling pins out of empty bottles and rice - but tells us that we can make them from anything we have at home. He uses a ball and knocks some of the pins down! Miss Elaina arrives and take a turn of her own. She knocks three pins over! Music Man Stan and Miss Elaina love to play games together.
content.short_description: Music Man Stan plays a homemade bowling game.
content.title: Music Man Stan's Bowling Game

content.description: Prince Wednesday is playing soccer in his backyard, but his glasses keep falling off! Good thing he has his glasses strap to keep them on while he's playing.
content.short_description: Prince Wednesday plays soccer, and talks about his glasses.
content.title: Prince Wednesday's Glasses

content.description: Cousin Chrissie brushes her horse Peaches to get all the dirt out of her coat. Using a stepstool and Prince Tuesday's help, Chrissie climbs up to ride Peaches.
content.short_description: Cousin Chrissie spends time with her horse Peaches.
content.title: Chrissie's Horseback Ride

content.description: Teacher Harriet likes to wake up so early in the morning, that the sun isn't up yet. She takes a morning walk and says hello to all the neighbors as they start their days. Teacher Harriet goes to the park to stretch her muscles, and then watches the sun rise.
content.short_description: Teacher Harriet wakes up early - even before the sun is up!
content.title: Teacher Harriet's Morning Stretch

content.description: Baker Aker loves to bake, but he also loves to dance! He invites us inside the bakery to show off his Folklorico dance. He points his toes, snaps, and claps. Anyone can dance - if you can't dance with your feet, you can dance with your hands, or even your eyebrows!
content.short_description: Baker Aker shows off a style of dance called Folklorico.
content.title: Baker Aker's Dance

content.description: Miss Elaina leads us to the garden in her front yard. She lifts up a leaf on one of the yellow flowers and reveals...a snail! Miss Elaina pulls her nature notebook out of her backpack and draws the snail's swirly shell and wiggly body - and puts a smile on it's face!
content.short_description: Miss Elaina uses her nature notebook to draw a snail on a flower.
content.title: Miss Elaina's Nature Notebook

content.description: It's bedtime for Katerina Kittycat! Instead of her mom reading a book to her, she decides to tell her mom a story. Katerina shows her mom a book she made herself about a kitty cat family just like Katerina and her mom!
content.short_description: It's Katerina's bedtime! She reads a bedtime book to her mom.
content.title: Katerina's Bedtime Book
